c1.name: One More Flask!
c1.descriptionRaw: When a <color=#FFD780FF>Fluffy Meowball</color> fired by the {LINK#N11240001}<color=#FFD780FF>Purr-loined Treasure Flask</color>{/LINK} from the Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Savvy Strategy: Splitting the Spoils</color> hits an enemy, there is a 50% chance for it to bounce, dealing the corresponding Elemental DMG to nearby opponents.
c1.description: When a Fluffy Meowball fired by the **Purr-loined Treasure Flask** from the Elemental Skill Savvy Strategy: Splitting the Spoils hits an enemy, there is a 50% chance for it to bounce, dealing the corresponding Elemental DMG to nearby opponents.

c2.name: Rogue's Quick Thinking
c2.descriptionRaw: <color=#FFD780FF>Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam</color>: In the Ascension Talent {LINK#P1242101}<color=#FFD780FF>"Plan to Get Paid,"</color>{/LINK} Jahoda can secretly track, in addition to the element with the highest number of characters, the element with the next highest number of characters among the remaining types. This allows up to two elemental effects to be active at once. You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "Plan to Get Paid."
c2.description: Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: In the Ascension Talent **"Plan to Get Paid,"** Jahoda can secretly track, in addition to the element with the highest number of characters, the element with the next highest number of characters among the remaining types. This allows up to two elemental effects to be active at once. You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "Plan to Get Paid."

c3.name: Desperate Gamble
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11245}Hidden Aces: Seven Tools of the Hunter{/LINK}</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of **Hidden Aces: Seven Tools of the Hunter** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Wild Berry Amid the Dust
c4.descriptionRaw: When a {LINK#N11240002}<color=#FFD780FF>Purrsonal Coordinated Assistance Robot</color>{/LINK} from the Elemental Burst <color=#FFD780FF>Hidden Aces: Seven Tools of the Hunter</color> undergoes an Elemental Conversion, Jahoda will recover 4 Elemental Energy.
c4.description: When a **Purrsonal Coordinated Assistance Robot** from the Elemental Burst Hidden Aces: Seven Tools of the Hunter undergoes an Elemental Conversion, Jahoda will recover 4 Elemental Energy.

c5.name: The Greatest Treasure
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11242}Savvy Strategy: Splitting the Spoils{/LINK}</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of **Savvy Strategy: Splitting the Spoils** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: The Littlest Luck
c6.descriptionRaw: <color=#FFD780FF>Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam</color>: After the {LINK#N11240001}<color=#FFD780FF>Purr-loined Treasure Flask</color>{/LINK} from the Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Savvy Strategy: Splitting the Spoils</color> is full, nearby Moonsign characters in your party have their CRIT Rate increased by 5% and CRIT DMG increased by 40% for 20s.
c6.description: Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: After the **Purr-loined Treasure Flask** from the Elemental Skill Savvy Strategy: Splitting the Spoils is full, nearby Moonsign characters in your party have their CRIT Rate increased by 5% and CRIT DMG increased by 40% for 20s.
